Some other ones I'd like to request are: Core OS, Qubes OS, Alpine Linux and Subgraph OS.
For Android, there should be Replicant, Omni and Copperhead.

Also maybe a different font? One that scales well. Any mono-space font will look nice.
Double column, too. It looks like the current layout might be wasting space?
